Heroes_Villains.States

Class BattleState

  • java.lang.Object
    • Heroes_Villains.States.State
      • Heroes_Villains.States.BattleState

  • public class BattleState
extends State
    Class for battle state of the game, manages battles and minigames against villains

      • BattleState

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Description copied from class: State
        Abstract update method, this method gets defined properly in the children of state and gets ran 60 times per second. This method is used to provide the functionality to the states of the game.
        Specified by:
        update in class State

      • render

        public void render(java.awt.Graphics graphics)
        Description copied from class: State
        Abstract render method, this method gets defined properly in the children of state and gets ran 60 times per second. This method is used to create the look of the states of the game.
        Specified by:
        render in class State
        Parameters:
        graphics - Graphics object, required to be able to use render methods of objects defined in the current state

      • won

        public void won(int hero)
        Method that gets called when a particular minigame gets won, reduced the current lives of the villain by 1 and sets won to true
        Parameters:
        hero - hero object that won the minigame

      • lost

        public void lost(int hero)
        Method that gets called when a particular minigame gets lost by a particular hero
        Parameters:
        hero - hero object, hero that loses the game

      • nextGame
